head.title: A Place for Everything Under the Sunroof

hedline.hl1: A Place for Everything Under the Sunroof

abstract.p: Minivans and other vehicles are being crammed with host of appliances and living-room fixtures, from dual climate controls to computer game systems; manufacturers cite demands from Americans who find themselves spending more of lives on wheels (Special Sections, Cars); photos; diagrams (M)

block.p: Something domestic, as in cozy, has crept into car DNA. It all started with cup holders, of course. But now minivans and other vehicles are being invaded by a flood of appliances and living-room fixtures, from dual climate controls to computer game systems, crammed in by carmakers in response to the demands of Americans who find themselves spending more of their lives on wheels. Here's a chance to design your own comfort cruiser -- just snip, fold and insert -- or save this diagram to keep the children occupied on a long trip.
